title: How do I maximize the battery  life?
answer:
1、Press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/4-111115143244.PNG) to lock the screen when you do not use the phone.  
2、Set the screen timeout to the smallest value: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115143304.PNG) > Settings > Display > Screen timeout.  
3、Set the screen brightness to a lower degree: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115143312.PNG) > Settings > Display >Brightness.  
4、Turn off Bluetooth and Wi-Fi: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115143321.PNG) > Settings > Wireless & networks and uncheck Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.  
5、Disable background data synchronization: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115143330.PNG) > Settings > Accounts & sync and uncheck Background data and Auto-sync.  
6、Disable data service: Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115143339.PNG)> Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks and uncheck Data enabled.  
7、Disable GPS: Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115143348.PNG)> Settings > Location & security and uncheck Use GPS satellites.  
8、Use only 2G networks: Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115143356.PNG)> Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks and uncheck Use only 2G networks.
